About.title: About
About.p-one: My name's Facundo and I'm a programmer from Argentina. I enjoy creating web pages and applications that make me improve as a professional, my goal is to be able to contribute to the development of projects that improve user experiencies and be very useful for internet.
About.p-two: What brings me to programming is the desire to create the tools I use on a daily basis, I love the videogames, watch series, use  social networks, and use blockchain, and it excites me to think that I can be part of its development üòÅ

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.experience-li-one: Design, development and launch of my first personal portfolio.
Experience.experience-li-two: Design, development of projects using different languages, frameworks, effects, responsive designs and methodologies.
Experience.experience-li-three: Design, development and launch of my second personal portfolio.
Experience.experience-li-four: Design, development of plugin for WordPress with basic features like differents roles, some CPT and custom templates.
Experience.experience-li-five: Project course: Blog creation with MERN STACK (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) and Postman.
Experience.experience-li-six: Project course: Blog creation with MEAN STACK (MongoDB, ExpressJS, Angular, NodeJS) TypeScript and Postman.
Experience.experience-p: Maintenance and customer support through JavaScript, JQuery, PHP y CSS code in plugins compatible with WordPress and WooCommerce.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.contact-p: If you have a project in which you want me to be a part, or you want to talk about technology, ask me a question or give me your opinion, do not hesitate to contact me üëá
